title: I need help to import my Thunderbird/Betterbird Email Profile
content:
Hi: I need to import my data shown here: C:\Users\DonB\AppData\Roaming\Betterbird\t70e12zz.default\Mail\pop-mail.outlook.com so I see all my email and its folder structure.

I think Outlook.com became: outlook365.com?

Where do I change this stuff so it works?

My Profile archive: https://1drv.ms/u/c/f1c69e25e0d2390a/EYrCbhynjyhGptVQ-P5ZWGUBDJFeXZno-JwoGDWXauj_9Q?e=gK0kOL

Thanks, mozillafan
creator: mozillzfan

title: Import everything from TypeApp
content:
I use TypeApp on my android phone. If I install Thunderbird (which I have been using for years on my PC--love it, but unrelated to this question) on my phone, can I import everything from TypeApp into Thunderbird mobile and quit TypeApp?

Thanks in advance.

Jon
creator: mygarage1991

title: Why is trash emptied on exit?
content:
In the Settings > Local > Disc Space I have selected: Delete messages more than 61 days old.

In the Local > Trash > [right click] > Properties > Retention Policy, I have also specified: Delete messages more than 61 days old.

Why are the messages deleted from the Trash when I close TB?
creator: emfril

content: How can I permanently disable threading please. I am missing important emails because threading is effectively hiding them.
